original_text:
Heroes Hunt 2 Megaways
Per i giocatori che apprezzano le slot con una impostazione tipica dei videogiochi o dei giochi di ruolo mescolati, allora Heroes Hunt Megaways  dello studio svedese Fantasma Games potrebbe essere la scelta giusta. Molte delle critiche riguardavano le lunghe animazioni e la difficoltà di attivare i giochi bonus. In risposta, Fantasma Games è tornata nella sala di progettazione e ha rilasciato Heroes Hunt 2 Megaways, un gioco che utilizza i concetti fondamentali trovati nel primo, con nuove missioni da completare.
Se ti piacciono le slot dove i modificatori giocano un ruolo importante, allora puoi considerare di provare la slot Heroes Hunt 2 Megaways. Anche se qui abbiamo gli stessi premi di puntata come in Heroes Hunt Megaways, viene fatto un miglioramento nelle caratteristiche. Oltre ai modificatori, ci sono i tre tipi di giri gratuiti e i wilds in espansione. Per saperne di più sulla slot Heroes Hunt 2 Megaways continua a leggere la nostra recensione completa.
Una grafica da gioco di ruolo fantasy
Heroes Hunt 2 Megaways assomiglia molto alla slot originale, basata su un’ambientazione medievale con una grande attenzione ai dettagli. Il gioco ha come protagonisti vari guerrieri animali, che sono disegnati con un’estetica così impressionante, che si potrebbe pensare che questo sia un gioco di marca basato su una serie televisiva.
Dopo un po’ di ambientazione, i giocatori si trovano in una stanza a pilastri del castello, davanti a un pannello di gioco a 6 rulli alimentato da Megaways, semi-coperto di tessere di blocco. Non è così stimolante come una stanza piena di tesori custoditi da un drago, ma comunque piena di fantasia, se questo è il tuo genere.
Le statistiche sono interessanti. Su tutta la linea, ogni categoria offre un numero sano, ma non sempre riflette il modo in cui le sessioni di gioco si sono svolte. Iniziare le cose in modo positivo è l’RTP con un valore predefinito del 96,49%, che sale al 96,82% o al 96,97% quando si acquistano rispettivamente i Free Spins Werewolf o Vampire. Come prima, l’avventura è altamente volatile, con un grande potenziale in offerta, anche se il limite massimo è stato abbassato un po’ questa volta. La scelta delle puntate è possibile da 20 centesimi a 50 euro per spin, il tutto disponibile su qualsiasi dispositivo.
Premi “spin”, e fino a sei simboli atterrano su ogni bobina, producendo tra 64 e 46.656 modi per vincere. I giocatori ottengono una vincita quando tre o più simboli corrispondenti si posano da sinistra a destra in qualsiasi fila a partire dal rullo più a sinistra. Quattro rocce di basso valore iniziano i simboli di pagamento, poi arrivano monete, corone, arcieri, maghi, guerrieri e vampiri come valori più alti. Se una combinazione vincente di sei simboli di premi atterra, i giocatori raccolgono una vincita che vale da 2 a 10 volte la loro puntata.
Funzioni e simboli della Slot Machine
Ogni eroe ha il proprio modificatore, attivato quando l’eroe è attivo e il suo simbolo corrispondente atterra sui rulli 2-5 nel gioco base o nei Vampire Free Spins:
Il mago ha una funzione Explosion, e quando il simbolo Explosion compare esplodendo e rimuovendo se stesso, i simboli di pagamento non vincenti e le tessere bloccanti in una o due aree 2×2, o un’area 3×3. Dopo l’esplosione, 1 tipo di simbolo pagante casuale riempie tutti gli spazi vuoti creati dalla bomba.
Il Guerriero porta con sé una caratteristica Expanding Wild. Quando il simbolo della spada atterra, il rullo su cui si trova viene trasformato in un Wild Reel, rimuovendo i simboli sopra o sotto di esso. Questo Wild Reel ottiene un moltiplicatore da x2 a x6, applicato a qualsiasi vincita di cui fa parte. Un altro wild di dimensioni 1×1 viene anche aggiunto a un altro rullo in una posizione casuale.
L’Arciere porta una funzione Respin. Quando trovi il simbolo della freccia, esso e 4 o 9 altri simboli casuali non vincenti o bloccanti vengono rimossi. Il numero di tessere rimosse crea un moltiplicatore dello stesso valore. Nuovi simboli scendono a cascata per riempire gli spazi vuoti, e qualsiasi vincita è soggetta al moltiplicatore.
Mentre si cerca di sbloccare gli eroi, i simboli del forziere possono atterrare sul rullo 6. Quando lo fanno, aggiungono +1 EXP a uno degli eroi bloccati o innescano Werewolf Free Spins. Ci vogliono 3 EXP per sbloccare un eroe.
Se i Werewolf Free Spins si attivano, i giocatori ottengono 10 giri gratuiti che non possono essere riattivati. Durante questa funzione, i simboli Werewolf Wild possono apparire sui rulli 2-5, trasformando in wild anche i simboli Warrior, Wizard o Archer adiacenti.
Quando tutti e 3 gli eroi sono attivati, i simboli del petto smettono di atterrare sul rullo 6, e un nuovo simbolo chiave entra in gioco, apparendo in qualsiasi posizione. Quando 3 chiavi sono in vista, su piastrelle non bloccanti, vengono assegnati 10 Vampire Free Spins. Durante questa funzione, se la funzione Explosion, Expanding Wild, o Respin rimuove 12 o più simboli del Vampiro, il Vampiro viene ucciso, e vengono assegnati Super Free Spins. Ogni volta che un simbolo del Vampiro viene rimosso, o per ogni simbolo Vampiro vincente, viene aggiunto +1 Vampire Spins. Quando i Vampire Free Spins si concludono, i giocatori tornano al gioco base e scelgono un eroe da sbloccare di nuovo, ricominciando il processo da capo.
I Super Free Spins, quando vengono assegnati, permettono di ottenere 2 giri gratuiti su un tavolo di gioco 6×6 completamente aperto dove ogni vincita viene moltiplicata per 100. Solo i simboli jolly o regolari appaiono durante i Super Free Spins.

raw_translation.response:
Heroes Hunt 2 Megaways is a slot game from the Swedish studio Fantasma Games that will appeal to players who appreciate a video game or RPG-style setting. This game is a sequel to Heroes Hunt Megaways, which received criticism for its lengthy animations and difficult-to-trigger bonus games. In response, Fantasma Games went back to the drawing board and released Heroes Hunt 2 Megaways, a game that utilizes the fundamental concepts found in the first, with new missions to complete.

If you are a fan of slot games where modifiers play an important role, then you should definitely consider trying the Heroes Hunt 2 Megaways slot. While we have the same betting prizes as in Heroes Hunt Megaways, there are improvements in the features. In addition to modifiers, there are three types of free spins and expanding wilds. To learn more about the Heroes Hunt 2 Megaways slot, keep reading our full review.

The graphics in Heroes Hunt 2 Megaways are reminiscent of a medieval RPG, with great attention to detail. The game features various animal warriors who are drawn with such impressive aesthetics that you might mistake it for a branded game based on a TV series.

Upon setup, players find themselves in a castle pillar room, in front of a 6-reel Megaways-powered game board, semi-covered with blocking tiles. It’s not as exciting as a room full of treasure guarded by a dragon, but it's still rich in fantasy, if that's your style.

The statistics are interesting. Across the board, each category offers a healthy number, but it does not always reflect how gaming sessions have gone. Starting things off on a positive note is the RTP with a default value of 96.49%, which rises to 96.82% or 96.97% when purchasing the Werewolf or Vampire Free Spins respectively. As before, the adventure is highly volatile, with a great potential offering, even though the maximum limit has been slightly lowered this time. Betting choices range from 20 cents to 50 euros per spin, all available on any device.

Hit the "spin" button, and up to six symbols land on each reel, producing between 64 and 46,656 ways to win. Players get a win when three or more matching symbols land from left to right in any row starting from the leftmost reel. Low-value rock formations start off the payout symbols, followed by coins, crowns, archers, magicians, warriors, and vampires as higher values. If a winning combination of six prize symbols lands, players collect a win worth 2 to 10 times their bet.

Heroes have their own modifiers, activated when the hero is active and their corresponding symbol lands on reels 2-5 in the base game or in Vampire Free Spins:

The Wizard has an Explosion function, and when the Explosion symbol appears, it explodes and removes itself, non-winning payout symbols and blocking tiles in one or two 2×2 areas, or one 3×3 area. After the explosion, 1 random paying symbol fills all the spaces created by the bomb.

The Warrior brings an Expanding Wild feature. When the sword symbol lands, the reel it is on turns into a Wild Reel, removing the symbols above or below it. This Wild Reel gets a multiplier from x2 to x6, applied to any win it is a part of. Another 1×1 size wild is also added to another random reel position.

The Archer brings a Respin function. When you find the arrow symbol, it and 4 or 9 other random non-winning or blocking symbols are removed. The number of tiles removed creates a multiplier of the same value. New symbols cascade down to fill the empty spaces, and any win is subject to the multiplier.

While trying to unlock the heroes, chest symbols can land on reel 6. When they do, they add +1 EXP to one of the locked heroes or trigger Werewolf Free Spins. It takes 3 EXP to unlock a hero.

If Werewolf Free Spins are triggered, players get 10 free spins that cannot be reactivated. During this feature, Werewolf Wild symbols can appear on reels 2-5, also turning adjacent Warrior, Wizard or Archer symbols into wilds.

When all 3 heroes are activated, chest symbols stop landing on reel 6, and a new key symbol comes into play, appearing in any position. When 3 keys are in view, on non-blocking tiles, 10 Vampire Free Spins are awarded. During this feature, if the Explosion, Expanding Wild, or Respin feature removes 12 or more Vampire symbols, the Vampire is killed, and Super Free Spins are awarded. Every time a Vampire symbol is removed, or for every winning Vampire symbol, +1 Vampire Spin is added. When the Vampire Free Spins end, players go back to the base game and choose a hero to unlock again, starting the process all over.

Super Free Spins, when awarded, allow for 2 free spins on a fully open 6×6 game layout where every win is multiplied by 100. Only wild or regular symbols appear during Super Free Spins.

Quattro rocce di basso valore iniziano i simboli di pagamento, poi arrivano monete, corone, arcieri, maghi, guerrieri e vampiri come valori più alti. Se una combinazione vincente di sei simboli di premi atterra, i giocatori raccolgono una vincita che vale da 2 a 10 volte la loro puntata.
Funzioni e simboli della Slot Machine
Ogni eroe ha il proprio modificatore, attivato quando l’eroe è attivo e il suo simbolo corrispondente atterra sui rulli 2-5 nel gioco base o nei Vampire Free Spins:
Il mago ha una funzione Explosion, e quando il simbolo Explosion compare esplodendo e rimuovendo se stesso, i simboli di pagamento non vincenti e le tessere bloccanti in una o due aree 2×2, o un’area 3×3. Dopo l’esplosione, 1 tipo di simbolo pagante casuale riempie tutti gli spazi vuoti creati dalla bomba.
Il Guerriero porta con sé una caratteristica Expanding Wild. Quando il simbolo della spada atterra, il rullo su cui si trova viene trasformato in un Wild Reel, rimuovendo i simboli sopra o sotto di esso. Questo Wild Reel ottiene un moltiplicatore da x2 a x6, applicato a qualsiasi vincita di cui fa parte. Un altro wild di dimensioni 1×1 viene anche aggiunto a un altro rullo in una posizione casuale.
L’Arciere porta una funzione Respin. Quando trovi il simbolo della freccia, esso e 4 o 9 altri simboli casuali non vincenti o bloccanti vengono rimossi. Il numero di tessere rimosse crea un moltiplicatore dello stesso valore. Nuovi simboli scendono a cascata per riempire gli spazi vuoti, e qualsiasi vincita è soggetta al moltiplicatore.
Mentre si cerca di sbloccare gli eroi, i simboli del forziere possono atterrare sul rullo 6. Quando lo fanno, aggiungono +1 EXP a uno degli eroi bloccati o innescano Werewolf Free Spins. Ci vogliono 3 EXP per sbloccare un eroe.
Se i Werewolf Free Spins si attivano, i giocatori ottengono 10 giri gratuiti che non possono essere riattivati. Durante questa funzione, i simboli Werewolf Wild possono apparire sui rulli 2-5, trasformando in wild anche i simboli Warrior, Wizard o Archer adiacenti.
Quando tutti e 3 gli eroi sono attivati, i simboli del petto smettono di atterrare sul rullo 6, e un nuovo simbolo chiave entra in gioco, apparendo in qualsiasi posizione. Quando 3 chiavi sono in vista, su piastrelle non bloccanti, vengono assegnati 10 Vampire Free Spins. Durante questa funzione, se la funzione Explosion, Expanding Wild, o Respin rimuove 12 o più simboli del Vampiro, il Vampiro viene ucciso, e vengono assegnati Super Free Spins. Ogni volta che un simbolo del Vampiro viene rimosso, o per ogni simbolo Vampiro vincente, viene aggiunto +1 Vampire Spins. Quando i Vampire Free Spins si concludono, i giocatori tornano al gioco base e scelgono un eroe da sbloccare di nuovo, ricominciando il processo da capo.
I Super Free Spins, quando vengono assegnati, permettono di ottenere 2 giri gratuiti su un tavolo di gioco 6×6 completamente aperto dove ogni vincita viene moltiplicata per 100. Solo i simboli jolly o regolari appaiono durante i Super Free Spins.

message.content:
Heroes Hunt 2 Megaways

For the experienced gamblers who appreciate slot games with a typical RPG or video game setting, Heroes Hunt Megaways by the Swedish studio Fantasma Games may be the right choice. Many of the criticisms of the first installment were due to the long animations and the difficulty in activating bonus games. In response, Fantasma Games has gone back to the drawing board and released Heroes Hunt 2 Megaways, a game that utilizes the fundamental concepts found in the first, with new missions to complete.

If you enjoy slots where modifiers play an important role, then you should consider trying Heroes Hunt 2 Megaways. Although here we have the same betting prizes as in Heroes Hunt Megaways, improvements have been made to the features. In addition to the modifiers, there are three types of free spins and expanding wilds. To learn more about Heroes Hunt 2 Megaways Slot, continue reading our full review.

A fantasy RPG-like graphic

Heroes Hunt 2 Megaways closely resembles the original slot, based on a medieval setting with great attention to detail. The game features various animal warriors, designed with such an impressive aesthetic that one might think this is a branded game based on a TV series.

After a bit of setting, players find themselves in a pillared room of the castle, in front of a game panel with 6 Megaways-fed rolls, semi-covered by blocking tiles. It's not as exciting as a room full of treasures guarded by a dragon, but it's full of imagination, if this is your genre.

The stats are interesting. Across the board, each category offers a healthy number, although it doesn't always reflect how the gaming sessions have gone. Starting things off positively is the RTP with a default value of 96.49%, which goes up to 96.82% or 96.97% when you respectively purchase the Free Spins Werewolf or Vampire. As before, the adventure is highly volatile, with a great potential on offer, although the maximum limit has been lowered a bit this time. Betting range is possible from 20 cents to 50 euros per spin, all available on any device.

Press "spin", and up to six symbols land on each reel, producing between 64 and 46,656 ways to win. Players win when three or more matching symbols land from left to right in any row starting from the leftmost reel. Four low-value rocks start the pay symbols, then come coins, crowns, archers, wizards, warriors, and vampires as higher values. If a winning combination of six prize symbols lands, players collect a win worth 2 to 10 times their bet.

Functions and symbols of the Slot Machine

Each hero has his own modifier, activated when the hero is active, and his corresponding symbol lands on reels 2-5 in the base game or in the Vampire Free Spins:

The wizard has an Explosion feature, and when the Explosion symbol appears exploding and removing itself, non-winning pay symbols and blocking tiles in one or two 2×2 areas, or a 3×3 area, are removed. After the explosion, 1 random paying symbol type fills all empty spaces created by the bomb.

The Warrior brings with him an Expanding Wild feature. When the sword symbol lands, the reel on which it is located is transformed into a Wild Reel, removing the symbols above or below it. This Wild Reel gets a multiplier from x2 to x6, applied to any win it is part of. Another 1×1 sized wild is also added to another reel in a random position.

The Archer brings a Respin feature. When you find the arrow symbol, it and 4 or 9 other random non-winning or blocking symbols are removed. The number of tiles removed creates a multiplier of the same value. New symbols cascade down to fill the empty spaces, and any win is subject to the multiplier.

While trying to unlock the heroes, the chest symbols can land on reel 6. When they do, they add +1 EXP to one of the blocked heroes or trigger Werewolf Free Spins. It takes 3 EXP to unlock a hero.

If the Werewolf Free Spins are triggered, players get 10 free spins that cannot be reactivated. During this feature, Werewolf Wild symbols can appear on reels 2-5, also transforming adjacent Warrior, Wizard, or Archer symbols into wilds.

When all 3 heroes are activated, chest symbols stop landing on reel 6, and a new key symbol comes into play, appearing in any position. When 3 keys are in view, on non-blocking tiles, 10 Vampire Free Spins are awarded. During this feature, if the Explosion, Expanding Wild, or Respin feature removes 12 or more Vampire symbols, the Vampire is killed, and Super Free Spins are awarded. Every time a Vampire symbol is removed, or for every winning Vampire symbol, +1 Vampire Spins is added. When the Vampire Free Spins end, players return to the base game and choose a hero to unlock again, starting the process anew.

The Super Free Spins, when awarded, allow for 2 free spins on a 6×6 fully open game board where every win is multiplied by 100. Only regular or joker symbols appear during the Super Free Spins.

Heroes Hunt 2 Megaways closely resembles the original slot, based on a medieval setting with great attention to detail. The game features various animal warriors, designed with such an impressive aesthetic that one might think this is a branded game based on a TV series.

After a bit of setting, players find themselves in a pillared room of the castle, in front of a game panel with 6 Megaways-fed rolls, semi-covered by blocking tiles. It's not as exciting as a room full of treasures guarded by a dragon, but it's full of imagination, if this is your genre.

If a winning combination of six prize symbols lands, players collect a win worth 2 to 10 times their bet.

Functions and symbols of the Slot Machine

Each hero has his own modifier, activated when the hero is active, and his corresponding symbol lands on reels 2-5 in the base game or in the Vampire Free Spins:

The wizard has an Explosion feature, and when the Explosion symbol appears exploding and removing itself, non-winning pay symbols and blocking tiles in one or two 2×2 areas, or a 3×3 area, are removed. After the explosion, 1 random paying symbol type fills all empty spaces created by the bomb.

The Warrior brings with him an Expanding Wild feature. When the sword symbol lands, the reel on which it is located is transformed into a Wild Reel, removing the symbols above or below it. This Wild Reel gets a multiplier from x2 to x6, applied to any win it is part of. Another 1×1 sized wild is also added to another reel in a random position.

The Archer brings a Respin feature. When you find the arrow symbol, it and 4 or 9 other random non-winning or blocking symbols are removed. The number of tiles removed creates a multiplier of the same value. New symbols cascade down to fill the empty spaces, and any win is subject to the multiplier.

While trying to unlock the heroes, the chest symbols can land on reel 6. When they do, they add +1 EXP to one of the blocked heroes or trigger Werewolf Free Spins. It takes 3 EXP to unlock a hero.

If the Werewolf Free Spins are triggered, players get 10 free spins that cannot be reactivated. During this feature, Werewolf Wild symbols can appear on reels 2-5, also transforming adjacent Warrior, Wizard, or Archer symbols into wilds.

When all 3 heroes are activated, chest symbols stop landing on reel 6, and a new key symbol comes into play, appearing in any position. When 3 keys are in view, on non-blocking tiles, 10 Vampire Free Spins are awarded. During this feature, if the Explosion, Expanding Wild, or Respin feature removes 12 or more Vampire symbols, the Vampire is killed, and Super Free Spins are awarded. Every time a Vampire symbol is removed, or for every winning Vampire symbol, +1 Vampire Spins is added. When the Vampire Free Spins end, players return to the base game and choose a hero to unlock again, starting the process anew.

The Super Free Spins, when awarded, allow for 2 free spins on a 6×6 fully open game board where every win is multiplied by 100. Only regular or joker symbols appear during the Super Free Spins.

Review:
 
Gameplay Mechanics

Heroes Hunt 2 Megaways features a medieval RPG-like setting with six Megaways-fed rolls. Up to six symbols can land on each reel, producing between 64 and 46,656 ways to win. Players win when three or more matching symbols land from left to right in any row starting from the leftmost reel. The adventure is highly volatile, with a great potential on offer, and interesting modifiers. Pressing 'spin', the player can bet from 20 cents to 50 euros per spin, on any device.

Free Spin Features

Heroes Hunt 2 Megaways offers three types of free spins: the Werewolf Free Spins, the Vampire Free Spins, and the Super Free Spins. The Werewolf Free Spins awards the player 10 free spins that cannot be reactivated, and during this feature, Werewolf Wild symbols can appear on reels 2-5, also transforming adjacent Warrior, Wizard, or Archer symbols into wilds. The Vampire Free Spins consist of 10 free spins that are triggered when three key symbols appear on non-blocking tiles. During this feature, if the Explosion, Expanding Wild, or Respin feature removes 12 or more Vampire symbols, the Vampire is killed, and Super Free Spins are awarded. Every time a Vampire symbol is removed, or for every winning Vampire symbol, +1 Vampire Spins are added. Finally, the Super Free Spins is triggered when it is awarded and it allows for 2 free spins on a 6×6 fully open game board where every win is multiplied by 100. Only regular or joker symbols appear during the Super Free Spins.

Heroes Hunt 2 Megaways closely resembles the original slot, based on a medieval setting with great attention to detail. The game features various animal warriors, designed with such an impressive aesthetic that one might think this is a branded game based on a TV series. Players will find themselves in a pillared room of the castle, in front of a game panel with 6 Megaways-fed rolls, semi-covered by blocking tiles. The graphic design is fantasy RPG-like and full of imagination.

Modifiers

In Heroes Hunt 2 Megaways, each hero has his own modifier, activated when the hero is active, and his corresponding symbol lands on reels 2-5 in the base game or in the Vampire Free Spins. The wizard has an Explosion feature, the Warrior brings with him an Expanding Wild feature, and the Archer brings a Respin feature. All of these modifiers are interesting and can lead to great payouts.

The RTP for Heroes Hunt 2 Megaways has a default value of 96.49%, which can go up to 96.82% or 96.97% when purchasing the Free Spins Werewolf or Vampire, respectively. Across the board, each category offers a healthy number, although it doesn't always reflect how the gaming sessions have gone.

Betting Options

Players can bet from 20 cents to 50 euros per spin. Betting options are available on any device, so the players can enjoy the game from their mobile phone, tablet, or desktop computer.

Objective of the Game

The objective of Heroes Hunt 2 Megaways is to collect wins by landing three or more matching symbols from left to right in any row starting from the leftmost reel. The game also offers the possibility to unlock three heroes and activate their corresponding modifiers. The ultimate objective of the game is to trigger the Super Free Spins and get huge payouts.

Review: Heroes Hunt 2 Megaways

For the experienced gamblers who appreciate slot games with a typical RPG or video game setting, Heroes Hunt Megaways by the Swedish studio Fantasma Games may be the right choice. Many of the criticisms of the first installment were due to the long animations and the difficulty in activating bonus games. In response, Fantasma Games has gone back to the drawing board and released Heroes Hunt 2 Megaways, a game that utilizes the fundamental concepts found in the first, with new missions to complete.

If you enjoy slots where modifiers play an important role, then you should consider trying Heroes Hunt 2 Megaways. Although here we have the same betting prizes as in Heroes Hunt Megaways, improvements have been made to the features. In addition to the modifiers, there are three types of free spins and expanding wilds. To learn more about Heroes Hunt 2 Megaways Slot, continue reading our full review.

A fantasy RPG-like graphic

Heroes Hunt 2 Megaways closely resembles the original slot, based on a medieval setting with great attention to detail. The game features various animal warriors, designed with such an impressive aesthetic that one might think this is a branded game based on a TV series.

After a bit of setting, players find themselves in a pillared room of the castle, in front of a game panel with 6 Megaways-fed rolls, semi-covered by blocking tiles. It's not as exciting as a room full of treasures guarded by a dragon, but it's full of imagination, if this is your genre.

The stats are interesting. Across the board, each category offers a healthy number, although it doesn't always reflect how the gaming sessions have gone. Starting things off positively is the RTP with a default value of 96.49%, which goes up to 96.82% or 96.97% when you respectively purchase the Free Spins Werewolf or Vampire. As before, the adventure is highly volatile, with a great potential on offer, although the maximum limit has been lowered a bit this time. Betting range is possible from 20 cents to 50 euros per spin, all available on any device.

Press "spin", and up to six symbols land on each reel, producing between 64 and 46,656 ways to win. Players win when three or more matching symbols land from left to right in any row starting from the leftmost reel. Four low-value rocks start the pay symbols, then come coins, crowns, archers, wizards, warriors, and vampires as higher values. If a winning combination of six prize symbols lands, players collect a win worth 2 to 10 times their bet.

Functions and symbols of the Slot Machine

Each hero has his own modifier, activated when the hero is active, and his corresponding symbol lands on reels 2-5 in the base game or in the Vampire Free Spins:

The wizard has an Explosion feature, and when the Explosion symbol appears exploding and removing itself, non-winning pay symbols and blocking tiles in one or two 2×2 areas, or a 3×3 area, are removed. After the explosion, 1 random paying symbol type fills all empty spaces created by the bomb.

The Warrior brings with him an Expanding Wild feature. When the sword symbol lands, the reel on which it is located is transformed into a Wild Reel, removing the symbols above or below it. This Wild Reel gets a multiplier from x2 to x6, applied to any win it is part of. Another 1×1 sized wild is also added to another reel in a random position.

The Archer brings a Respin feature. When you find the arrow symbol, it and 4 or 9 other random non-winning or blocking symbols are removed. The number of tiles removed creates a multiplier of the same value. New symbols cascade down to fill the empty spaces, and any win is subject to the multiplier.

While trying to unlock the heroes, the chest symbols can land on reel 6. When they do, they add +1 EXP to one of the blocked heroes or trigger Werewolf Free Spins. It takes 3 EXP to unlock a hero.

If the Werewolf Free Spins are triggered, players get 10 free spins that cannot be reactivated. During this feature, Werewolf Wild symbols can appear on reels 2-5, also transforming adjacent Warrior, Wizard, or Archer symbols into wilds.

When all 3 heroes are activated, chest symbols stop landing on reel 6, and a new key symbol comes into play, appearing in any position. When 3 keys are in view, on non-blocking tiles, 10 Vampire Free Spins are awarded. During this feature, if the Explosion, Expanding Wild, or Respin feature removes 12 or more Vampire symbols, the Vampire is killed, and Super Free Spins are awarded. Every time a Vampire symbol is removed, or for every winning Vampire symbol, +1 Vampire Spins is added. When the Vampire Free Spins end, players return to the base game and choose a hero to unlock again, starting the process anew.

The Super Free Spins, when awarded, allow for 2 free spins on a 6×6 fully open game board where every win is multiplied by 100. Only regular or joker symbols appear during the Super Free Spins.
